name: SoundWizz Ear Training - Audio Engineering, EQ, FX
description: Grant your ears the workout they need to stay on top as an audio engineer, music producer or musician.  A well trained ear helps you compose music, produce beats, mix and master music, play your instrument and simply enhances the joy of listening to sound in general.  SoundWizz is designed to efficiently enhance your aural skills in frequency recognition, sense of rhythm, feel for compression, FX and your understanding of harmonics - all on the go and in a single app.  Key Features - Variety of Frequency & Equalizer Training Units - Rhythm, Harmonics, FX, EQ & BPM Units - Tone Generator, Metronome & BPM Tapper Tools on board - Go-to Ear Training App for Audio Engineers & Musicians - Stay at it with Activity Tracking and FunkyMonkeys friendly assistance  With SoundWizz you learn to hear the right frequencies in a variety of instruments and audio mixes, get a feel for rhythm in pattern and BPM training units and get to know about harmonics, scales, intervals and chords in a single training session.  It includes a set of audio engineering tools, such as a tone generator, BPM tapper and a metronome to accompany your daily work as a musician or audio engineer.  For the best sound experience please use headphones, keep the volume of your device low and increase it only as necessary.
